Table1.News title: Vaccinations now available for children 12 and up
Table1.News content: The Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine is authorized for use in children age 12 and older. Parents and guardians can now book appointments for them in My Turn. Have questions about vaccine safety and effectiveness? We have answers.

Table1.News title: COVID-19 vaccinations in California reach 30 million
Table1.News content: The total number of COVID-19 vaccinations administered in California has reached 30 million. See vaccination statistics statewide and broken down by county in our Vaccine Dashboard.

Table1.News title: California aims to fully reopen June 15
Table1.News content: The move forward comes as the state has reached 20 million vaccinations, including 4 million in its hardest-hit communities. Masking and vaccinations will continue. Hospitalization rates must stay low and vaccination availability high for the state to fully reopen.
